handleAcrossMessage(address,uint256,bool.details: Only Across can call this. Will be reverted if tokens have not been received fully yet.

params._amount: Amount received by the contract (after reducing fees)
params._fillCompleted: True if all tokens have been received
params._relayer: Addres of relayer who submitted the request

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

retrySwapAndUnwrap(bytes,uint8,bytes32,b.details: User signs a message for retrying its request

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdrawFundsToEth(bytes,uint8,bytes32,b.details: User signs a message requesting for withdrawing a bid

emergencyWithdraw(address,address,uint25.notice: Withdraws tokens in the emergency case

handleAcrossMessage(address,uint256,bool.notice: Processes requests coming from Ethereum (using Across)

handleV3AcrossMessage(address,uint256,ad.notice: Process requests coming from Ethereum (using Across V3)

retrySwapAndUnwrap(bytes,uint8,bytes32,b.notice: Retry failed exchange and burn requests
